title: The French solution
creator_credit: Gordon Stewart, Maxine Crook and Canadian Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: Emphasises the importance of daily physical education for children. Outlines the experiments conducted in France and Canada on daily activity for children and notes parents’ and children’s responses to exposure to physical education on a daily basis. Suitable for teacher/tertiary level.
